Interactions between Antipsychotics, Trazadone, and Birth

Control

The combination of antipsychotic medications, trazodone, and birth control

medications can increase the risk of adverse effects such as changes in

menstrual cycle, mood changes, increased risk of blood clots, and orthostatic

hypotension.
